title: Dream
summary: [Character 1] wakes up in the middle of a night, recalling the events of the fading dream.

title: Guild
summary: [character 1] finds themselves at the guild's training hall.

title: Stress Relief
summary: [Character 1] relieves their stress in whatever manner suits them.

title: Graveyard Shift
summary: [Character 1] assists the Caretaker in tending to the graveyard during a particularly eerie night.

title: Sewer Exploration
summary: [Character 1] ventures into the sewers, driven by curiosity or necessity, and fortunately doesn't encounter any Ratfolk.

title: Ancestor's Whispers
summary: [Character 1] experiences unsettling visions while standing before the Ancestor's statue.

title: Farmland Patrol
summary: [Character 1] patrols the outskirts of the farmlands, wary of corrupted farmhands.

title: Blacksmith's Apprentice
summary: [Character 1] spends a day assisting the Blacksmith, learning the intricacies of weapon and armor maintenance.

title: Nomad's Tale
summary: [Character 1] listens to the Nomad's tales of distant lands and strange artifacts.

title: Solitary Reflection
summary: [Character 1] spends time in solitary reflection, confronting inner demons and past regrets.

title: Dockside Reverie
summary: [Character 1] spends time at the docks, watching ships come and go, pondering the world beyond the hamlet.

title: Perimeter Watch
summary: [Character 1] takes a shift watching the hamlet's perimeter, alert for any signs of danger.

title: Hunting Expedition
summary: [Character 1] goes on a solitary hunting trip in the surrounding wilderness.
